metadata.description: Official Claude Code plugins for AgentDashboards development. Battle-tested patterns for Xano backend + Next.js frontend stack.

plugins.name: xano-sdk-builder
plugins.description: Complete Xano development toolkit. XanoScript SDK, curl testing, batch migrations, MCP workflow patterns. BUILD->TEST->UPDATE->REPEAT for 95%+ success.

plugins.name: frontend-dev-guidelines
plugins.description: React/TypeScript best practices for AgentDashboards. ShadCN UI, TanStack Router, Suspense patterns, MUI v7 compatibility.

plugins.name: playwright-testing
plugins.description: Browser automation and E2E testing with Playwright MCP. Snapshots, form filling, visual testing, console error debugging.

plugins.name: xano-builder-agent
plugins.description: Autonomous Xano backend developer agent. Builds endpoints incrementally following proven patterns.

plugins.name: recommended-mcp-servers
plugins.description: Pre-configured MCP servers: Playwright for browser testing, Xano for backend operations. Install once, ready to use.
